name: Dinosaur Sniper Hunter
description:
Welcome to dinosaur shooting game. In this game player is on a jungle and faced real difficult condition in shadow of cool weather. In the forest commando player will search dinosaur and hunt them down to protect his life.

The games most difficult condition will take real test of solider. Snow and coldness give bulky impact on the performance of the player. Movement of dinosaur will create real difficulties to shoot dinosaur. Player will use different technique to attack on dinosaur.

Commando player has different kind of weapon like gun and knife. But player will use all kind of weapon according to situation. Map will play important role for find location of dinosaur. Same color trees and mountain will create real difficulties for player to find dinosaur. Sometime player will attack on front but sometime side on and back side.

When player finished all dinosaur successfully than he will be enter into next level. All the upcoming level is more challenging but don't worry smooth control will provide a great gaming experience to you.
